title: Quiet corner unit 3BR 2.5BA Townhouse NEW UPGRADES
posting_body: ['8043 Michelena Ave  Las Vegas, NV  89147', '$1900.00 / Month', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.', '---------------------------', 'Property Details:', '3 BEDROOMS | 2.5 BATHROOMS', 'Located minutes from the Las Vegas strip off Flamingo Road, this corner unit townhouse was just renovated with new appliances/fans/countertops.', 'Across the street from a beautiful walking path and located on a cul-de-sac with little vehicular traffic.', 'Community pool is one street away.', 'Private gated patio area provides extra security with steel gate.', 'Single car garage with plenty of off street parking.', 'Additional strict rental criteria will be required for lease consideration such as but not limited to:-', 'No Prior evictions-', 'Full Background Check-', 'No past serious convictions (ie:  theft, murder, rape, drugs)- Minimum credit score: 680- Minimum Income 3:1 ratio-', 'Security deposit 1.5 months- W-2, tax returns and bank statements required-', 'Landlord references required-', "No 'blank space' restriction on application-", 'Very small pets may be considered - no pit bullsNOTE:  Pre-screening questionnaire form is required before main application is approved.', ' Message for pre-screen form.', '***Small Dogs, Cats Allowed***', 'Property Type:', 'Townhouse', 'Lease Terms:', '$1900.00/Month', '$2850.00 Deposit', 'Lease Length:', 'One Year', 'Available:', '08/01/2022', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Refrigerator', 'Dryer', 'Microwave', 'Washer', 'Freezer', 'Oven', 'Building Amenities:', 'Off Street Parking', 'Garage', 'On Site Laundry', 'Bicycle Parking', 'Hottub Spa', 'Cable Ready', 'Washer Dryer Hookups', 'Swimming Pool', 'Fireplace', 'Lawn', 'Fitness Center', 'Near Parks', 'Wired For Internet', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.']
